page.title: 14Shopping Facilities
page.content:
A survey of the shops in Cleobury Mortimer shows them all to be on the main street which, in fact, is comprised of three streets, Lower Street, Church Street and High Street.
2 butchers 2 grocers/greengrocers 1 baker 1 greengrocer 1 chemist 2 self-service grocers 1 draper 1 florist/pet shop 1 boutique 1 insurance office 1 electrical 1 health foods 2 ironmongers 1 video hire/sales 2 newsagents 2 hairdressers 1 fishmonger 1 beauty salon 1 antiques 1 charity shop 1 coal dealer 1 freezer centre 1 haberdasher 1 estate agent 2 shoe/fancy goods shops.
This survey was compiled on 24th July, 1985.
